markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wild Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=316) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 134 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[wild order](/DruidicOrders.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

You are one with the wild, always changing and adapting to meet any challenge. You gain the [_wild shape_](/Spells.aspx?ID=481) order spell, which lets you transform into a variety of forms that you can expand with druid feats.

<title level="2">Wild Shape leads to...</title>
[Bizarre Transformation](/Feats.aspx?ID=3769), [Elemental Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=335), [Ferocious Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=330), [Form Control](/Feats.aspx?ID=321), [Insect Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=327), [Monstrosity Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=349), [Plant Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=338), [Reactive Transformation](/Feats.aspx?ID=1718), [Soaring Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=333), [Thousand Faces](/Feats.aspx?ID=324), [True Shapeshifter](/Feats.aspx?ID=355)
name: Wild Shape
